TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuStrip extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip

summary.span: 提供功能表系統給表單。

span.span: Provides a menu system for a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已取代的最上層容器。 is the top-level container that supersedes . 它也提供金鑰的處理和多個文件介面 (MDI) 功能。It also provides key handling and multiple document interface (MDI) features. 在功能上，並連同工作，但它們衍生自。Functionally, and work along with , although they are derived from . 下列項目專為與兩者都能完美合作和在所有方向。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 它們是在設計階段的預設可用的控制項：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - 控制項表示表單功能表結構的容器。The control represents the container for the menu structure of a form. 您可以加入物件至，代表功能表結構中個別的功能表命令。You can add objects to the that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure. 每個可以是您的應用程式的命令或其他子功能表項目的父功能表。Each can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items. 雖然 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範在多重文件介面 (MDI) 的案例。The following code example demonstrates a in a multiple-document interface (MDI) scenario. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/CS/Program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/VB/Program.vb#10)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 是否支援溢位功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the supports overflow functionality.

value.span: 如果 支援溢位功能，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the supports overflow functionality; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 溢位功能會移至 下拉式選單功能表項目時沒有足夠的空間中顯示這些。The overflow feature moves menu items to a drop-down menu when there is not enough room to display them in a . 當您設定屬性，以`true`，您必須設定啟用特定的功能表項目溢位屬性。When you set the property to `true`, you must also enable overflow for specific menu items by setting the property. 根據預設，如果無法納入可用空間，不會顯示功能表項目。By default, menu items are not displayed if they cannot fit within the available space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來設定控制項的內部間距。Use the property to set the interior space between controls. 當控制項的項目容器時，填補會從在容器的邊緣表示空間。When a control is a container of items, padding represents the space from the edge of the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或探索這顯示 MDI 子系。Use the property to designate or discover which displays MDI children. 使用並子功能表，以反映變更的值上的事件。Use the and events on child menus to reflect changes to the value of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuActivate As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者以鍵盤或滑鼠存取功能表時。

span.span: Occurs when the user accesses the menu with the keyboard or mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ALT 鍵，以啟動時或通常都不需要也不移除目前具有焦點之控制項的焦點。When activated by the ALT key, the or typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus. 如果沒有內裝載的控制項的下拉式清單或，控制項取得焦點，當使用者按下 TAB 鍵。If there is a control hosted within the or a drop-down of the , the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key. 一般情況下， ， ， ，以及事件可能不在由鍵盤啟用時才引發。In general, the , , , and events of might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard. 在這種情況下，使用和事件改。In such cases, use the and events instead. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`MenuStrip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MenuStrip1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#489](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#489)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#489](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#489)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ALT 鍵，以啟動時或通常都不需要也不移除目前具有焦點之控制項的焦點。When activated by the ALT key, the or typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus. 如果沒有內裝載的控制項的下拉式清單或，控制項取得焦點，當使用者按下 TAB 鍵。If there is a control hosted within the or a drop-down of the , the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key. 一般情況下， ， ， ，以及事件可能不在由鍵盤啟用時才引發。In general, the , , , and events of might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard. 在這種情況下，使用和事件改。In such cases, use the and events instead. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`MenuStrip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MenuStrip1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#490](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#490)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#490](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#490)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnMenuActivate(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnMenuActivate (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnMenuActivate : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnMenuActivate : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)

span.span: The Windows to process.
Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有訊息都會都傳送至方法之後取得透過篩選方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法完全對應於 Windows `WindowProc` 函式。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 如需有關處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WindowProc 回呼函式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms633573)。For more information about processing Windows messages, see [WindowProc callback function](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms633573). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以處理作業系統訊息中識別結構。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. WM_ACTIVATEAPP 作業系統訊息會在此範例中得知另一個應用程式會變成作用中處理。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 位於 MSDN library 的 Platform SDK 文件參考是指http://msdn.microsoft.com/library若要了解可用， ，和值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library to understand the available , , and values. 實際的常數值可以找到 windows.h 標頭檔包含在平台 SDK （Core SDK 一節） 下載，這也是可在 MSDN 上取得。Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on MSDN. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 立即呼叫端呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

para.span: 繼承控制項應該呼叫基底類別的方法來處理它們不會處理任何訊息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
